snippet: Turning Point: Christopher Manson, a British photographer based in Toronto, was inspired by Eugene Richards.
abstract: Turning Point: Christopher Manson, a British photographer based in Toronto, was inspired by Eugene Richards.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Manson is a British photographer based in Toronto and a recent graduate of Ryerson University. Mr. Manson, 32,  has spent the last year working on a project about teenagers with Type 1 diabetes.
